divs: Sighting Details I was driving home from work at approximately 5:41pm . I was on the 91 freeway eastbound . The sun had gone down at least thirty minutes earlier. I was nearing my exit at Valley View , when something caught my attention in the sky directly infront of me at about 45 degrees . I noticed a reddish, orangish ball about the size if a dime, appeared very quickly then dissapeared . It caught my attention and I began to look for any aircraft lights then again it reappeared for maybe a second or two, then the best way to desribe it , like the old fashion cameras from the fortys with the flash bulb. It flashed then dissappeared. I continued to look for aircraft lights , but did not see any.
Summary: Flash of light in the sky while driving on the 91 Fwy heading East
